revision.text: Possibly: De sectore & radio : the description and vse of the sector in three bookes : the description and vse of the crosse-staffe in other three books : for such as are studious of mathematicall practise. (Description and use of the sector, the crosse-staffe and other instruments, by Edmund Gunter). (London : Printed by William Iones and are to be sold by Iohn Tomson at his house in Hosier-lane, 1623). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1692969~S1
